description:
Pochi was originally a nameless slave known simply as "Dog" belonging to a man named http://anidb.net/ch95997 [Urs], but became master-less after his death. She was given the name "Pochi" by http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] during the events of the labyrinth and became his slave after leaving the labyrinth.
Source: Death March Wikia
name: Pochi
